alerts.title: Alert Management
alerts.subtitle: Configure and manage system alerts
alerts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this alert?
alerts.noActive: No active alerts - everything is running smoothly!
alerts.noConfigs: No alert configurations. Create one to get started!

help.title: Alert Management
help.overviewContent: The Alerts tab allows you to create and manage custom system alerts. Get notified when metrics exceed defined thresholds.
help.typesContent:
Available alerts by category:
• System: CPU, memory, disk, error rate
• Services: service down, test failed, latency
• MCP: error rate, request volume, response time
• Users: sync failed, permissions denied
• Training: worker offline, GPU, training failed
help.configContent:
To create an alert:
• Name: alert identifier
• Type: metric to monitor
• Severity: low, medium, high, critical
• Threshold: value that triggers the alert
• Duration: time before triggering
• Cooldown: delay between triggers
help.managementContent:
Available tabs:
• Active alerts: ongoing alerts to resolve
• Configurations: list of alert rules
• History: log of past alerts
• MTTR: mean time to resolution

help.title: System Metrics
help.overviewContent: The Metrics tab displays a real-time dashboard of your system's health. Monitor CPU, memory, disk resources and service availability.
help.resourcesContent:
View resource utilization:
• CPU: processor usage percentage
• Memory: used / total RAM
• Disk: storage space used
• Uptime: system running time
help.servicesContent:
Monitor your services status:
• Continuity: availability test history
• Scheduler: configurable automatic tests
• Visual indicators: green (OK) / red (error)
help.statsContent:
Key statistics cards:
• Services: healthy services / total ratio
• Active alerts: number of ongoing alerts
• Logs 24h: volume and error rate
• Network I/O: transferred data

serviceContinuity.title: Service Continuity
serviceContinuity.noHistory: No history available. Test your services to generate data.

alertSummary.title: Active Alerts ({{count}})
alertSummary.resolved24h: {{count}} alerts resolved in the last 24 hours

help.title: Log Viewer
help.overviewContent: The Logs tab allows you to search and analyze system logs in real-time. Filter by level, source, or service to quickly find information.
help.levelsContent:
Available levels:
• Debug: detailed debugging information
• Info: normal system events
• Warning: non-critical warnings
• Error: errors requiring attention
• Critical: urgent critical errors
help.filtersContent:
Filter options:
• Search: free text in messages
• Level: debug, info, warning, error, critical
• Source: log emitting component
• Service: service associated with log
help.exportContent:
Export filtered logs:
• JSON or CSV format
• Customizable time period
• Includes metadata
• Optional auto-refresh for continuous monitoring
